name: MyGroove Design, Inc.
tagline: Oakland Brand Consulting & Graphic Design Studio
description:
MyGroove Design, Inc. is a brand consulting & graphic design studio based in Oakland, California which serves the greater Bay Area and beyond.
We specialize in brand & design strategies, brand design & development, logo design & identity development, promotional & collateral design, web design & interactive services for the avant-garde, individuals, entrepreneurs, artists, musicians, start-ups, not-for-profits, and small to mid-sized businesses and firms.
